query.statement: select _id from lessons_tmp

alertDialog.title: Information
alertDialog.message: The From Date cannot be less than the Start Date

query.statement: SELECT schedules._id as _id, (UPPER(users.name) || ' / ' || UPPER(companies.name)) as teacher_company, (strftime('%d/%m/%Y', date) || ' - ' || countries.currency || ' ' || CAST(user_disciplines.price as text)) as date_price FROM schedules INNER JOIN user_disciplines ON schedules.fk_user = user_disciplines.fk_user INNER JOIN users ON user_disciplines.fk_user = users._id INNER JOIN companies ON users.fk_company = companies._id INNER JOIN clients ON clients.fk_country = companies.fk_country INNER JOIN countries ON companies.fk_country = countries._id WHERE user_disciplines.fk_discipline = {{vwDisciplines__listDisciplines__selectedValue}} and schedules.status = 1 and (CAST(strftime('%Y%m%d', date) as integer) BETWEEN {{dtFrom}} and {{dtTo}})

SELECT schedule_details._id as _id, (schedule_details.start || ' - ' || schedule_details.end) as hours FROM schedule_details WHERE schedule_details.fk_schedule = {{vwTeacherSchedules__listTeacherSchedules__selectedValue}}
SELECT * FROM lessons_tmp
SELECT _id FROM lessons ORDER BY _id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM lesson_details_tmp

SELECT discounts._id as _id, discounts.percent as percent, discounts.condition_start as condition_start, discounts.condition_end as condition_end FROM discounts INNER JOIN companies ON discounts.fk_company = companies._id WHERE discounts.code = '{{vwDiscountCode__txtCode__text}}' AND (discounts.condition_start <= (CAST('{{vTotal}}' as decimal)) AND discounts.condition_end >= (CAST('{{vTotal}}' as decimal)))
SELECT discipline_types._id as _id, UPPER(discipline_types.description) as description FROM discipline_types order by discipline_types.description

SELECT disciplines._id as _id, UPPER(disciplines.description) as description FROM disciplines WHERE disciplines.fk_disc_type = {{vwDisciplineTypes__listDisciplineTypes__selectedValue}} ORDER BY disciplines.description

SELECT users.fk_company as fk_company, strftime('%d/%m/%Y',schedules.date) as date, users.name as name, user_disciplines.price as price, countries.currency as currency FROM user_disciplines INNER JOIN users ON user_disciplines.fk_user = users._id INNER JOIN companies ON users.fk_company = companies._id INNER JOIN countries ON companies.fk_country = countries._id INNER JOIN schedules ON user_disciplines.fk_user = schedules.fk_user WHERE schedules._id = {{vwTeacherSchedules__listTeacherSchedules__selectedValue}} and user_disciplines.fk_discipline = {{vwDisciplines__listDisciplines__selectedValue}}
SELECT lesson_statuses._id as _id, UPPER(lesson_statuses.description) as description FROM lesson_statuses order by lesson_statuses.description

SELECT lessons._id as _id, users._id as idTeacher, (UPPER(users.name) || ' / ' || UPPER(companies.name)) as teacher_company, strftime('%d/%m/%Y', schedules.date) as date FROM lessons INNER JOIN schedules ON lessons.fk_schedule = schedules._id INNER JOIN users ON schedules.fk_user = users._id INNER JOIN companies ON lessons.fk_company = companies._id WHERE lessons.fk_less_stat = {{vwLessonStatuses__listLessonStatuses__selectedValue}} order by lessons._id

SELECT discipline_types.description as disc_type, disciplines.description as discipline, strftime('%d/%m/%Y',schedules.date) as date, users.name as teacher, lessons.hours as hours, lessons.currency as currency, lessons.price_hour as price_hour, lessons.value_discount as value_discount, lessons.value_wo_discount as value_wo_discount, lessons.value_total as value_total, IFNULL(lesson_ratings.description,'rating') as rating, IFNULL(lesson_reasons.description,'reason') as reason, IFNULL(lesson_evaluations.observations,'obs') as obs FROM lessons INNER JOIN discipline_types ON lessons.fk_disc_type = discipline_types._id INNER JOIN disciplines ON lessons.fk_discipline = disciplines._id INNER JOIN schedules ON lessons.fk_schedule = schedules._id INNER JOIN users ON schedules.fk_user = users._id LEFT JOIN lesson_evaluations ON lessons._id = lesson_evaluations.fk_lesson LEFT JOIN lesson_ratings ON lesson_evaluations.fk_rating = lesson_ratings._id LEFT JOIN lesson_reasons ON lesson_evaluations.fk_reason = lesson_reasons._id WHERE lessons._id = {{vwLessons__listLessons__selectedValue}}

SELECT lesson_details._id as _id, (schedule_details.start || ' - ' || schedule_details.end) as hours FROM lesson_details INNER JOIN schedule_details ON lesson_details.fk_sche_det = schedule_details._id WHERE lesson_details.fk_lesson = {{vwLessons__listLessons__selectedValue}}
SELECT lesson_ratings._id as _id, lesson_ratings.description as description FROM lesson_ratings ORDER BY lesson_ratings._id
SELECT lesson_reasons._id as _id, lesson_reasons.description as description FROM lesson_reasons ORDER BY lesson_reasons._id
SELECT _id FROM client_favorites WHERE client_favorites.fk_client = {{__user_id}} AND client_favorites.fk_user = {{vIdTeacher}}

alertDialog.title: Favorites Success
alertDialog.message: The teacher is already in favorites

alertDialog.title: Favorites Success
alertDialog.message: The teacher was added to favorites

query.statement: SELECT users._id as _id, UPPER(users.name) as teacher, UPPER(companies.name) as company FROM users INNER JOIN client_favorites ON users._id = client_favorites.fk_user INNER JOIN companies ON users.fk_company = companies._id order by users.name

alertDialog.title: Information
alertDialog.message: Still do not have Favorite Teachers

query.statement: select _id from lessons_tmp

SELECT DISTINCT discipline_types._id as _id, UPPER(discipline_types.description) as disc_type FROM users INNER JOIN user_disciplines ON users._id = user_disciplines.fk_user INNER JOIN disciplines ON user_disciplines.fk_discipline = disciplines._id INNER JOIN discipline_types ON disciplines.fk_disc_type = discipline_types._id WHERE users._id = {{vwFavoriteTeachers__listFavoriteTeachers__selectedValue}}  order by discipline_types.description

SELECT disciplines._id as _id, UPPER(disciplines.description) as disc FROM disciplines WHERE disciplines.fk_disc_type = {{vwFavoDiscTypes__listFavoDiscTypes__selectedValue}} order by disciplines.description

alertDialog.title: Information
alertDialog.message: The From Date cannot be less than the Start Date

query.statement: SELECT schedules._id as _id, strftime('%d/%m/%Y', date) as date, (countries.currency || ' ' || CAST(user_disciplines.price as text)) as price FROM schedules INNER JOIN user_disciplines ON schedules.fk_user = user_disciplines.fk_user INNER JOIN users ON user_disciplines.fk_user = users._id INNER JOIN companies ON users.fk_company = companies._id INNER JOIN clients ON clients.fk_country = companies.fk_country INNER JOIN countries ON companies.fk_country = countries._id WHERE user_disciplines.fk_discipline = {{vwFavoDiscs__listFavoDiscs__selectedValue}} and user_disciplines.fk_user = {{vwFavoriteTeachers__listFavoriteTeachers__selectedValue}} and schedules.status = 1 and (CAST(strftime('%Y%m%d', date) as integer) BETWEEN {{dtFrom}} and {{dtTo}})

SELECT schedule_details._id as _id, (schedule_details.start || ' - ' || schedule_details.end) as hours FROM schedule_details WHERE schedule_details.fk_schedule = {{vwFavoTeacDates__listFavoTeacDates__selectedValue}}

SELECT users.fk_company as fk_company, strftime('%d/%m/%Y',schedules.date) as date, users.name as name, user_disciplines.price as price, countries.currency as currency FROM user_disciplines INNER JOIN users ON user_disciplines.fk_user = users._id INNER JOIN companies ON users.fk_company = companies._id INNER JOIN countries ON companies.fk_country = countries._id INNER JOIN schedules ON user_disciplines.fk_user = schedules.fk_user WHERE schedules._id = {{vwFavoTeacDates__listFavoTeacDates__selectedValue}} and user_disciplines.fk_discipline = {{vwFavoDiscs__listFavoDiscs__selectedValue}}
SELECT companies._id as _id, UPPER(companies.name) as name FROM companies INNER JOIN clients ON companies.fk_country = clients.fk_country order by companies.name

SELECT discounts._id as _id, UPPER(discounts.code) as code, ('-' || CAST((discounts.percent*100) as text) || '%') as percent, (countries.currency || ' ' || CAST(discounts.condition_start as text) || ' AND ' || countries.currency || ' ' || CAST(discounts.condition_end as text)) as condition FROM discounts INNER JOIN companies ON discounts.fk_company = companies._id INNER JOIN countries ON companies.fk_country = countries._id WHERE discounts.fk_company = {{vwCompanyDiscounts__listCompanyDiscounts__selectedValue}} order by discounts.code
